name: JMacAdapter
short_description: JMacAdapter is a Mac OS X adapter for Java built as a reflective wrapper for com.apple.eawt.*, allowing programs to look and behave like native Mac OS X applications without having to depend on com.apple.eawt.* imports, which are often unavailable.
